price: 18. And indeed those before them belied (the Messengers of Allâh), then how terrible was My denial (punishment)?
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ كَذَّبَ ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبۡلِهِمۡ فَكَيۡفَ كَانَ نَكِيرِ
